Content: Military pressure can bot be attached to the system/map, since this
way one would be threatened by foreign wars. So instead a secondary
measure named Dager is introduced. It is created by foreign ships,

destruction of ships and piracy.
It simulates the saftey-need if a
planets population by increasing its need for patrol ships. It also
points out dangerous areas to the AI. It is always visible to everyone,
so it is a global value saved on the map structure.
